## MFAContainer.activateTOTP() method

Activates time-based one time password (TOTP) MFA authenticator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
activateTOTP(otp: string): Promise<ActivateTOTPResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otp | <code>string</code> | TOTP code |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<ActivateTOTPResult>`
